name: Baffling End
oracle_text: When Baffling End enters the battlefield, exile target creature an opponent controls with converted mana cost 3 or less.
When Baffling End leaves the battlefield, target opponent creates a 3/3 green Dinosaur creature token with trample.

name: Bishop of Binding
oracle_text: When Bishop of Binding enters the battlefield, exile target creature an opponent controls until Bishop of Binding leaves the battlefield.
Whenever Bishop of Binding attacks, target Vampire gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the power of the exiled card.

name: Blazing Hope
oracle_text: Exile target creature with power greater than or equal to your life total.
flavor_text:
"No shadow remains for you to hide in."
—Caparocti Sunborn

name: Cleansing Ray
oracle_text: Choose one —
• Destroy target Vampire.
• Destroy target enchantment.
flavor_text:
"The sun creates, sustains, and consumes so it can create again."
—Caparocti Sunborn

name: Divine Verdict
oracle_text: Destroy target attacking or blocking creature.
flavor_text: Cunning warriors and dim-witted beasts alike fall under the church's harsh judgment.

name: Everdawn Champion
oracle_text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to Everdawn Champion.
flavor_text:
"Undefeated in battle, she is the shining future our empire deserves."
—Huatli

name: Exultant Skymarcher
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text: "We have come at last to this holiest of holy places. What was stolen from us long ago is ours once again."

name: Famished Paladin
oracle_text: Famished Paladin doesn't untap during your untap step.
Whenever you gain life, untap Famished Paladin.
flavor_text: Loyal to his queen, slave to his thirst.

name: Forerunner of the Legion
oracle_text: When Forerunner of the Legion enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a Vampire card, reveal it, then shuffle your library and put that card on top of it.
Whenever another Vampire enters the battlefield under your control, target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

name: Imperial Ceratops
oracle_text: Enrage — Whenever Imperial Ceratops is dealt damage, you gain 2 life.
flavor_text:
"The music of blades against its silver armor merely inspires it to bellow more full-throated melodies."
—Huatli

name: Legion Conquistador
oracle_text: When Legion Conquistador enters the battlefield, you may search your library for any number of cards named Legion Conquistador, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle your library.
flavor_text: The Legion of Dusk sailed from Torrezon in search of glory, riches, and the Immortal Sun.

name: Luminous Bonds
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack or block.
flavor_text: "Your part in this fight is done, vampire. Get used to your thirst."

name: Majestic Heliopterus
oracle_text: Flying
Whenever Majestic Heliopterus attacks, another target Dinosaur you control gains flying until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Its rise is like the sun's, a beautiful beginning. Its descent is like the sun's, a frightful ending."
—Huatli

name: Martyr of Dusk
oracle_text: When Martyr of Dusk dies, create a 1/1 white Vampire creature token with lifelink.
flavor_text: "Should I fall, take up our standard and carry on. The Legion must always prevail."

name: Moment of Triumph
oracle_text: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. You gain 2 life.
flavor_text: "The time of salvation is at hand. Dusk washes over the world, and the Legion will rise immortal!"

name: Paladin of Atonement
oracle_text: At the beginning of each upkeep, if you lost life last turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Paladin of Atonement.
When Paladin of Atonement dies, you gain life equal to its toughness.
flavor_text: For every wound there is a blessing; for every death, a reckoning.

name: Pride of Conquerors
oracle_text: Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.)
Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn. If you have the city's blessing, those creatures get +2/+2 until end of turn instead.

name: Radiant Destiny
oracle_text: Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.)
As Radiant Destiny enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.
Creatures you control of the chosen type get +1/+1. As long as you have the city's blessing, they also have vigilance.

name: Raptor Companion
flavor_text: The abundance of foes in Orazca means the raptors no longer need any orders.

name: Sanguine Glorifier
oracle_text: When Sanguine Glorifier enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on another target Vampire you control.
flavor_text: For the Legion of Dusk, the Immortal Sun is a source of eternal life. When they reclaim it, they will no longer be forced to subsist on the blood of the wicked.

name: Skymarcher Aspirant
oracle_text: Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.)
Skymarcher Aspirant has flying as long as you have the city's blessing.
flavor_text: "I was born to glory."

name: Slaughter the Strong
oracle_text: Each player chooses any number of creatures they control with total power 4 or less, then sacrifices all other creatures they control.
flavor_text:
"Cut the beasts out from under them and their strength is nothing."
—Vona of Iedo, Butcher of Magan

name: Snubhorn Sentry
oracle_text: Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.)
Snubhorn Sentry gets +3/+0 as long as you have the city's blessing.
flavor_text: They're fun to train—if you like stubborn, aggressive, and fiercely territorial.

name: Sphinx's Decree
oracle_text: Each opponent can't cast instant or sorcery spells during that player's next turn.
flavor_text:
"Be still."
—Azor

name: Squire's Devotion
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has lifelink.
When Squire's Devotion enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Vampire creature token with lifelink.

name: Sun Sentinel
oracle_text: Vigilance
flavor_text: "I will not sleep until Orazca is ours once more."

name: Sun-Crested Pterodon
oracle_text: Flying
Sun-Crested Pterodon has vigilance as long as you control another Dinosaur.
flavor_text:
"Pterodons tolerate no intrusion into their skies. Even the clouds must ask permission."
—Mahuiz, Sun Empire archer

name: Temple Altisaur
oracle_text: If a source would deal damage to another Dinosaur you control, prevent all but 1 of that damage.
flavor_text:
"Kinjalli sculpted humans from clay, but the dinosaurs were carved from unyielding stone."
—Itzama the Crested

name: Trapjaw Tyrant
oracle_text: Enrage — Whenever Trapjaw Tyrant is dealt damage, exile target creature an opponent controls until Trapjaw Tyrant leaves the battlefield.
flavor_text:
"I would advise you not to struggle."
—Huatli

name: Zetalpa, Primal Dawn
oracle_text: Flying, double strike, vigilance, trample, indestructible
flavor_text: The sky takes flight and the earth trembles.

name: Admiral's Order
oracle_text: Raid — If you attacked with a creature this turn, you may pay {U} rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Counter target spell.
flavor_text: "Damn the cannons, mates. Charge!"

name: Aquatic Incursion
oracle_text: When Aquatic Incursion enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 blue Merfolk creature tokens with hexproof. (They can't be the targets of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
{3}{U}: Target Merfolk can't be blocked this turn.

name: Crafty Cutpurse
oracle_text: Flash
When Crafty Cutpurse enters the battlefield, each token that would be created under an opponent's control this turn is created under your control instead.
flavor_text: Possession is eleven-tenths of the pirate code.

name: Crashing Tide
oracle_text: Crashing Tide has flash as long as you control a Merfolk.
Return target creature to its owner's hand.
Draw a card.

name: Curious Obsession
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card."
At the beginning of your end step, if you didn't attack with a creature this turn, sacrifice Curious Obsession.

name: Deadeye Rig-Hauler
oracle_text: Raid — When Deadeye Rig-Hauler enters the battlefield, if you attacked with a creature this turn, you may return target creature to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: "Up you go, you soggy rat."

name: Expel from Orazca
oracle_text: Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.)
Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand. If you have the city's blessing, you may put that permanent on top of its owner's library instead.

name: Flood of Recollection
oracle_text: Return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand. Exile Flood of Recollection.
flavor_text: Jace tumbled down the waterfall and plunged deep into his past.

name: Hornswoggle
oracle_text: Counter target creature spell. You create a colorless Treasure artifact token with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color."
flavor_text: Being a merciful pirate, she saved the vampire's gold from falling overboard.

name: Induced Amnesia
oracle_text: When Induced Amnesia enters the battlefield, target player exiles all cards from their hand face down, then draws that many cards.
When Induced Amnesia is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, return the exiled cards to their owner's hand.

name: Kitesail Corsair
oracle_text: Kitesail Corsair has flying as long as it's attacking.
flavor_text: "Why perch in the crow's nest when I can fly like the crows?"

name: Kumena's Awakening
oracle_text: Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.)
At the beginning of your upkeep, each player draws a card. If you have the city's blessing, instead only you draw a card.

name: Mist-Cloaked Herald
oracle_text: Mist-Cloaked Herald can't be blocked.
flavor_text: With matchless stealth, the River Heralds fought a running battle against the three enemy forces.

name: Negate
oracle_text: Counter target noncreature spell.
flavor_text: "As one, nature lifts its voice to tell you this: ‘No.'"

name: Nezahal, Primal Tide
oracle_text: Nezahal, Primal Tide can't be countered.
You have no maximum hand size.
Whenever an opponent casts a noncreature spell, draw a card.
Discard three cards: Exile Nezahal. Return it to the battlefield tapped under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

name: Release to the Wind
oracle_text: Exile target nonland permanent. For as long as that card remains exiled, its owner may cast it without paying its mana cost.
flavor_text: "Here and gone like a fleeting breeze."

name: River Darter
oracle_text: River Darter can't be blocked by Dinosaurs.
flavor_text:
"Don't make splashes. Make progress."
—Tishana

name: Riverwise Augur
oracle_text: When Riverwise Augur enters the battlefield, draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand on top of your library in any order.
flavor_text: "Time flows as the rivers do, toward an unknown sea. The wise know to look downstream."

name: Sailor of Means
oracle_text: When Sailor of Means enters the battlefield, create a colorless Treasure artifact token with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color."
flavor_text: The rising tide of Orazca's plunder lifted all ships.

name: Sea Legs
oracle_text: Flash
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +0/+2 as long as it's a Pirate. Otherwise, it gets -2/-0.
flavor_text: "When the waves pick up, either you find your feet or you lose your lunch."

name: Seafloor Oracle
oracle_text: Whenever a Merfolk you control deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.
flavor_text: Where the light falls dim and blue on broken ships, secrets lie unclaimed.

name: Secrets of the Golden City
oracle_text: Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.)
Draw two cards. If you have the city's blessing, draw three cards instead.
flavor_text: Stolen knowledge can never be stolen back.

name: Silvergill Adept
oracle_text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, reveal a Merfolk card from your hand or pay {3}.
When Silvergill Adept enters the battlefield, draw a card.
flavor_text: "If you keep to the shallows, you'll never learn the secrets of the depths."

name: Siren Reaver
oracle_text: Raid — This spell costs {1} less to cast if you attacked with a creature this turn.
Flying
flavor_text: "Prepare to be boarded."

name: Slippery Scoundrel
oracle_text: Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.)
As long as you have the city's blessing, Slippery Scoundrel has hexproof and can't be blocked.
flavor_text: "I'd rather be caught red-handed than leave empty-handed!"

name: Soul of the Rapids
oracle_text: Flying
Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
flavor_text: With Kumena in control of the Immortal Sun, the rapids rose from their riverbeds and the waterfalls took flight.

name: Spire Winder
oracle_text: Flying
Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.)
Spire Winder gets +1/+1 as long as you have the city's blessing.

name: Sworn Guardian
flavor_text: For the River Heralds, the Immortal Sun is an object of terror and devastation. The idea that anyone would retrieve it for their own use is utterly abhorrent.

name: Timestream Navigator
oracle_text: Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.)
{2}{U}{U}, {T}, Put Timestream Navigator on the bottom of its owner's library: Take an extra turn after this one. Activate this ability only if you have the city's blessing.

name: Warkite Marauder
oracle_text: Flying
Whenever Warkite Marauder attacks, target creature defending player controls loses all abilities and has base power and toughness 0/1 until end of turn.

name: Waterknot
oracle_text: Enchant creature
When Waterknot enters the battlefield, tap enchanted creature.
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

name: Arterial Flow
oracle_text: Each opponent discards two cards. If you control a Vampire, each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
flavor_text: "It is impious to admit, but I do enjoy pirate blood. Something in the salty tang of it, the spice of rebellion."

name: Canal Monitor
flavor_text: The first goblin tried to swim the canal. The second built a raft. The last and craftiest goblin launched herself from a firecannon and soared over the canal, trailing smoke. All were eaten, but only one was cooked.

name: Champion of Dusk
oracle_text: When Champion of Dusk enters the battlefield, you draw X cards and you lose X life, where X is the number of Vampires you control.
flavor_text: "Drench these golden streets in the blood of our enemies."

name: Dark Inquiry
oracle_text: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card.
flavor_text: "Your mind is no longer yours to waste."

name: Dead Man's Chest
oracle_text: Enchant creature an opponent controls

When enchanted creature dies, exile cards equal to its power from the top of its owner's library. You may cast nonland cards from among them for as long as they remain exiled, and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any type to cast those spells.

name: Dinosaur Hunter
oracle_text: Whenever Dinosaur Hunter deals damage to a Dinosaur, destroy that creature.
flavor_text: "Aye, the foul beast chomped me, but I got away. You'd best believe when I find it again, it won't get away so easy."

name: Dire Fleet Poisoner
oracle_text: Flash
Deathtouch
When Dire Fleet Poisoner enters the battlefield, target attacking Pirate you control gets +1/+1 and gains deathtouch until end of turn.

name: Dusk Charger
oracle_text: Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.)
Dusk Charger gets +2/+2 as long as you have the city's blessing.
flavor_text: Stories say demon blood runs in its veins, making it fearless and bloodthirsty.

name: Dusk Legion Zealot
oracle_text: When Dusk Legion Zealot enters the battlefield, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.
flavor_text: Once they reached Orazca, the Legion's explorers ransacked tombs and temples, hunting for the Immortal Sun.

name: Fathom Fleet Boarder
oracle_text: When Fathom Fleet Boarder enters the battlefield, you lose 2 life unless you control another Pirate.
flavor_text: Without frequent raids, orcs sometimes get bored and plunder their own ships.

name: Forerunner of the Coalition
oracle_text: When Forerunner of the Coalition enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a Pirate card, reveal it, then shuffle your library and put that card on top of it.
Whenever another Pirate enters the battlefield under your control, each opponent loses 1 life.

name: Golden Demise
oracle_text: Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.)
All creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn. If you have the city's blessing, instead only creatures your opponents control get -2/-2 until end of turn.

name: Grasping Scoundrel
oracle_text: Grasping Scoundrel gets +1/+0 as long as it's attacking.
flavor_text: "I can hear the plunder calling. It asks for me by name."

name: Gruesome Fate
oracle_text: Each opponent loses 1 life for each creature you control.
flavor_text:
"You were keen enough to sink your fangs into us, vampire! And now you're afraid of a few little nibbles?"
—Udvil "Ratty" Ratlock

name: Impale
oracle_text: Destroy target creature.
flavor_text: Never let the glitter of gold distract you from the gleam of steel in the shadows.

name: Mastermind's Acquisition
oracle_text: Choose one —
• Search your library for a card, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.
• Choose a card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand.
flavor_text: Another piece of a nefarious puzzle.

name: Mausoleum Harpy
oracle_text: Flying
Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.)
Whenever another creature you control dies, if you have the city's blessing, put a +1/+1 counter on Mausoleum Harpy.

name: Moment of Craving
oracle_text: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn. You gain 2 life.
flavor_text: "The time of condemnation is at hand. Dusk washes over the world, and I consign you to eternal darkness!"

name: Oathsworn Vampire
oracle_text: Oathsworn Vampire enters the battlefield tapped.
You may cast Oathsworn Vampire from your graveyard if you gained life this turn.
flavor_text:
"My conquistadors are never slain, merely laid to rest."
—Queen Miralda the Pious

name: Pitiless Plunderer
oracle_text: Whenever another creature you control dies, create a colorless Treasure artifact token with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color."
flavor_text: "Shame to let good gold go to the grave."

name: Ravenous Chupacabra
oracle_text: When Ravenous Chupacabra enters the battlefield, destroy target creature an opponent controls.
flavor_text: Opening Orazca unleashed more horrors than just the Immortal Sun.

name: Reaver Ambush
oracle_text: Exile target creature with power 3 or less.
flavor_text: Onora knew with sudden, grim certainty he would never see the Great River again.

name: Recover
oracle_text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
Draw a card.
flavor_text:
"No more fear of death's oblivion—is this not the greatest treasure of all?"
—Gurezan, Legion resurrectionist

name: Sadistic Skymarcher
oracle_text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, reveal a Vampire card from your hand or pay {1}.
Flying, lifelink
flavor_text: "I will catch you, child of the sun. I will drink your life and leave you a husk, discarded in the shadows."

name: Tetzimoc, Primal Death
oracle_text: Deathtouch
{B}, Reveal Tetzimoc, Primal Death from your hand: Put a prey counter on target creature. Activate this ability only during your turn.
When Tetzimoc enters the battlefield, destroy each creature your opponents control with a prey counter on it.

name: Tomb Robber
oracle_text: Menace

{1}, Discard a card: Tomb Robber explores. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)

name: Twilight Prophet
oracle_text: Flying
Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.)

At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have the city's blessing, reveal the top card of your library and put it into your hand. Each opponent loses X life and you gain X life, where X is that card's converted mana cost.

name: Vampire Revenant
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text:
"A thick fog obscures the port of Leor, but it's not thick enough to muffle the screams."
—Admiral Beckett Brass

name: Vona's Hunger
oracle_text: Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.)
Each opponent sacrifices a creature. If you have the city's blessing, instead each opponent sacrifices half the creatures they control, rounded up.

name: Voracious Vampire
oracle_text: Menace
When Voracious Vampire enters the battlefield, target Vampire you control gets +1/+1 and gains menace until end of turn.
flavor_text: The purest devotion isn't the Blood Fast itself, but the craving that follows.

name: Blood Sun
oracle_text: When Blood Sun enters the battlefield, draw a card.
All lands lose all abilities except mana abilities.
flavor_text: As the struggle raged for control of the Immortal Sun, the world grew dark under a blood-red sky.

name: Bombard
oracle_text: Bombard deals 4 damage to target creature.
flavor_text:
"Want to sink a ship? Blow a hole in the hull. Want to kill a regisaur? Same answer."
—Captain Brandis Thorn

name: Brass's Bounty
oracle_text: For each land you control, create a colorless Treasure artifact token with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color."
flavor_text:
"Why squabble for trinkets when we could be living large off all this gold?"
—Admiral Beckett Brass

name: Brazen Freebooter
oracle_text: When Brazen Freebooter enters the battlefield, create a colorless Treasure artifact token with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color."
flavor_text: Finders, keepers.

name: Buccaneer's Bravado
oracle_text: Choose one —
• Target creature gets +1/+1 and gains first strike until end of turn.
• Target Pirate gets +1/+1 and gains double strike until end of turn.
flavor_text: Never underestimate the power of panache.

name: Charging Tuskodon
oracle_text: Trample
If Charging Tuskodon would deal combat damage to a player, it deals double that damage to that player instead.
flavor_text: It doesn't hold grudges. It runs them down and impales them.

name: Daring Buccaneer
oracle_text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, reveal a Pirate card from your hand or pay {2}.
flavor_text: No ancient lore ties the pirates of the Brazen Coalition to the Immortal Sun. But it's a powerful ancient artifact in a city of gold—what's not to covet?

name: Dire Fleet Daredevil
oracle_text: First strike

When Dire Fleet Daredevil enters the battlefield, exile target instant or sorcery card from an opponent's graveyard. You may cast that card this turn, and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any type to cast that spell. If that card would be put into a graveyard this turn, exile it instead.

name: Etali, Primal Storm
oracle_text: Whenever Etali, Primal Storm attacks, exile the top card of each player's library, then you may cast any number of nonland cards exiled this way without paying their mana costs.
flavor_text: The storm rages and the earth breaks.

name: Fanatical Firebrand
oracle_text: Haste
{T}, Sacrifice Fanatical Firebrand: It deals 1 damage to any target.
flavor_text:
"The Brazen Coalition is a firecannon pointed at our enemies. Goblins like him are the spark to its powder."
—Admiral Beckett Brass

name: Forerunner of the Empire
oracle_text: When Forerunner of the Empire enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a Dinosaur card, reveal it, then shuffle your library and put that card on top of it.
Whenever a Dinosaur enters the battlefield under your control, you may have Forerunner of the Empire deal 1 damage to each creature.

name: Form of the Dinosaur
oracle_text: When Form of the Dinosaur enters the battlefield, your life total becomes 15.
At the beginning of your upkeep, Form of the Dinosaur deals 15 damage to target creature an opponent controls and that creature deals damage equal to its power to you.

name: Frilled Deathspitter
oracle_text: Enrage — Whenever Frilled Deathspitter is dealt damage, it deals 2 damage to target opponent or planeswalker.
flavor_text: Nothing says trouble like a reedy hiss with a hint of liquid gurgle.

name: Goblin Trailblazer
oracle_text: Menace
flavor_text:
"Why are we following the goblin? Can he even read that map?"
—Daphne Vail, Diremore first mate

name: Mutiny
oracle_text: Target creature an opponent controls deals damage equal to its power to another target creature that player controls.
flavor_text: Pirate captains rarely enjoy a peaceful retirement.

name: Needletooth Raptor
oracle_text: Enrage — Whenever Needletooth Raptor is dealt damage, it deals 5 damage to target creature an opponent controls.
flavor_text: It hatches with its ferocity fully grown.

name: Orazca Raptor
flavor_text:
"If you come across a raptor in the city, stay perfectly still. At least then you'll be well rested when you die."
—Captain Brandis Thorn

name: Pirate's Pillage
oracle_text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card.
Draw two cards and create two colorless Treasure artifact tokens with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color."
flavor_text: Goblins can carry their body weight in loot.

name: Reckless Rage
oracle_text: Reckless Rage deals 4 damage to target creature you don't control and 2 damage to target creature you control.
flavor_text: "Hard to starboard! Starb— Abandon ship! Abandon ship!"

name: Rekindling Phoenix
oracle_text: Flying

When Rekindling Phoenix dies, create a 0/1 red Elemental creature token with "At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice this creature and return target card named Rekindling Phoenix from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste until end of turn."

name: See Red
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+1 and has first strike.
At the beginning of your end step, if you didn't attack with a creature this turn, sacrifice See Red.

name: Shake the Foundations
oracle_text: Shake the Foundations deals 1 damage to each creature without flying.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: A threefold calamity with a single will.

name: Shatter
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact.
flavor_text: Today it's a miracle of architecture, a marvel of stained glass, a symbol of the Legion's power. Tomorrow, driftwood.

name: Silverclad Ferocidons
oracle_text: Enrage — Whenever Silverclad Ferocidons is dealt damage, each opponent sacrifices a permanent.
flavor_text:
"Control them? No. I gird them in armor and let them loose."
—Yacha, Otepec huntmaster

name: Stampeding Horncrest
oracle_text: Stampeding Horncrest has haste as long as you control another Dinosaur.
flavor_text: When the golden city opened, the dinosaurs inside were eager to greet the new visitors.

name: Storm Fleet Swashbuckler
oracle_text: Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.)
Storm Fleet Swashbuckler has double strike as long as you have the city's blessing.
flavor_text: "A bolt to the eye, a blade to the neck. That's the way to clear the deck!"

name: Sun-Collared Raptor
oracle_text: Trample
{2}{R}: Sun-Collared Raptor gets +3/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"With Tilonalli's gifts, even the smallest of us can become great."
—Huatli

name: Swaggering Corsair
oracle_text: Raid — Swaggering Corsair enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it if you attacked with a creature this turn.
flavor_text: "I'm about to make you famous. From the golden city to High and Dry, they'll talk about how fast you died!"

name: Tilonalli's Crown
oracle_text: Enchant creature
When Tilonalli's Crown enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to enchanted creature.
Enchanted creature gets +3/+0 and has trample.

name: Tilonalli's Summoner
oracle_text: Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.)

Whenever Tilonalli's Summoner attacks, you may pay {X}{R}. If you do, create X 1/1 red Elemental creature tokens that are tapped and attacking. At the beginning of the next end step, exile those tokens unless you have the city's blessing.

name: Aggressive Urge
oracle_text: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: "Our lives, our homes, and all our history are at risk. Do not speak to me of peace."

name: Cacophodon
oracle_text: Enrage — Whenever Cacophodon is dealt damage, untap target permanent.
flavor_text: When a cacophodon is angry, the whole jungle knows.

name: Cherished Hatchling
oracle_text: When Cherished Hatchling dies, you may cast Dinosaur spells this turn as though they had flash, and whenever you cast a Dinosaur spell this turn, it gains "When this creature enters the battlefield, you may have it fight another target creature."
flavor_text: Despite its appearance, it's anything but defenseless.

name: Colossal Dreadmaw
oracle_text: Trample
flavor_text:
"Remember when it was the most terrifying thing you'd ever seen?"
—Captain Lannery Storm

name: Crested Herdcaller
oracle_text: Trample
When Crested Herdcaller enters the battlefield, create a 3/3 green Dinosaur creature token with trample.
flavor_text:
"Our survival, like theirs, depends on our ability to work together."
—Huatli, to Tishana

name: Deeproot Elite
oracle_text: Whenever another Merfolk enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on target Merfolk you control.
flavor_text: "You think I stand alone? I have the forest at my call, the waters at my back. I outnumber you."

name: Enter the Unknown
oracle_text: Target creature you control explores. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on the creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)
You may play an additional land this turn.

name: Forerunner of the Heralds
oracle_text: When Forerunner of the Heralds enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a Merfolk card, reveal it, then shuffle your library and put that card on top of it.
Whenever another Merfolk enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Forerunner of the Heralds.

name: Ghalta, Primal Hunger
oracle_text: Ghalta, Primal Hunger costs {X} less to cast, where X is the total power of creatures you control.
Trample
flavor_text: The earth walks, strongest of all.

name: Giltgrove Stalker
oracle_text: Giltgrove Stalker can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less.
flavor_text: "The only gold I need is the sheltering shimmer of the trees."

name: Hardy Veteran
oracle_text: As long as it's your turn, Hardy Veteran gets +0/+2.
flavor_text: For the Sun Empire, the Immortal Sun is a symbol of national identity. When they reclaim it, the Empire will flourish once more.

name: Hunt the Weak
oracle_text: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. Then that creature fights target creature you don't control. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)
flavor_text:
"Death lizard approaching, cap'n!"
—Brint Doobin, last words

name: Jade Bearer
oracle_text: When Jade Bearer enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on another target Merfolk you control.
flavor_text: "Sisora wore this, who defeated the tyrant of Azcanta, and before her Natena of Vuhana's band. May it bring you their strength."

name: Jadecraft Artisan
oracle_text: When Jadecraft Artisan enters the battlefield, target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor_text: "A blade is not fully forged until it is given."

name: Jadelight Ranger
oracle_text: When Jadelight Ranger enters the battlefield, it explores, then it explores again. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard. Then repeat this process.)

name: Jungleborn Pioneer
oracle_text: When Jungleborn Pioneer enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 blue Merfolk creature token with hexproof. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
flavor_text: "We fought so long to hide this place. Let us be first to learn its wonders!"

name: Knight of the Stampede
oracle_text: Dinosaur spells you cast cost {2} less to cast.
flavor_text: "My whisper becomes a thousand roars."

name: Naturalize
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
flavor_text:
"Better to let the sword go than to lose the arm with it."
—Captain Lannery Storm

name: Orazca Frillback
flavor_text: The frillbacks of Orazca soak up the sun on their tall spinal fins. They look slow and sleepy—until they catch the scent of prey.

name: Overgrown Armasaur
oracle_text: Enrage — Whenever Overgrown Armasaur is dealt damage, create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.
flavor_text: It embodies the riotous growth of the jungle, where creatures crowd upon creatures, where roots sprawl and vines swarm.

name: Path of Discovery
oracle_text: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, it explores. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on the creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)

name: Plummet
oracle_text: Destroy target creature with flying.
flavor_text:
"Still, the pterodon chasing the clouds from its skies must bow to the great forest below."
—Mahuiz, Sun Empire archer

name: Polyraptor
oracle_text: Enrage — Whenever Polyraptor is dealt damage, create a token that's a copy of Polyraptor.
flavor_text: An innumerable pack is concealed in a single reflection.

name: Strength of the Pack
oracle_text: Put two +1/+1 counters on each creature you control.
flavor_text: The pack that ambushes, eviscerates, and devours together stays together.

name: Swift Warden
oracle_text: Flash
When Swift Warden enters the battlefield, target Merfolk you control gains hexproof until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
flavor_text: A warning shout would take too long.

name: Tendershoot Dryad
oracle_text: Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.)
At the beginning of each upkeep, create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.
Saprolings you control get +2/+2 as long as you have the city's blessing.

name: Thrashing Brontodon
oracle_text: {1}, Sacrifice Thrashing Brontodon: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
flavor_text: It cares more about preserving the herd's territory than about preserving itself.

name: Thunderherd Migration
oracle_text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, reveal a Dinosaur card from your hand or pay {1}.
Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.
flavor_text: The herds follow as new growth arises.

name: Wayward Swordtooth
oracle_text: Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.)
You may play an additional land on each of your turns.
Wayward Swordtooth can't attack or block unless you have the city's blessing.

name: World Shaper
oracle_text: Whenever World Shaper attacks, you may put the top three cards of your library into your graveyard.
When World Shaper dies, put all land cards from your graveyard onto the battlefield tapped.
flavor_text: "The Great River will not be tamed."

name: Angrath, the Flame-Chained
oracle_text: +1: Each opponent discards a card and loses 2 life.
−3: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap it. It gains haste until end of turn. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step if it has converted mana cost 3 or less.
−8: Each opponent loses life equal to the number of cards in their graveyard.

name: Atzocan Seer
oracle_text: {T}: Add one mana of any color.
Sacrifice Atzocan Seer: Return target Dinosaur card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: Streams of gold and bright feathers flash in the orb, visions of past and future.

name: Azor, the Lawbringer
oracle_text: Flying
When Azor, the Lawbringer enters the battlefield, each opponent can't cast instant or sorcery spells during that player's next turn.
Whenever Azor attacks, you may pay {X}{W}{U}{U}. If you do, you gain X life and draw X cards.

name: Deadeye Brawler
oracle_text: Deathtouch
Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.)
Whenever Deadeye Brawler deals combat damage to a player, if you have the city's blessing, draw a card.

name: Dire Fleet Neckbreaker
oracle_text: Attacking Pirates you control get +2/+0.
flavor_text: The buccaneers scaled the sides of buildings as easily as they boarded enemy ships.

name: Elenda, the Dusk Rose
oracle_text: Lifelink
Whenever another creature dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Elenda, the Dusk Rose.
When Elenda dies, create X 1/1 white Vampire creature tokens with lifelink, where X is Elenda's power.
flavor_text: Her centuries-long search is ended.

name: Hadana's Climb
oracle_text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. Then if that creature has three or more +1/+1 counters on it, transform Hadana's Climb.
flavor_text: Hadana seeks power in the service of peace.

name: Winged Temple of Orazca
oracle_text: (Transforms from Hadana's Climb.)
{T}: Add one mana of any color.
{1}{G}{U}, {T}: Target creature you control gains flying and gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is its power.

name: Huatli, Radiant Champion
oracle_text: +1: Put a loyalty counter on Huatli, Radiant Champion for each creature you control.
−1: Target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of creatures you control.
−8: You get an emblem with "Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may draw a card."

name: Journey to Eternity
oracle_text: Enchant creature you control
When enchanted creature dies, return it to the battlefield under your control, then return Journey to Eternity to the battlefield transformed under your control.
flavor_text: Every journey has its inevitable end . . .

name: Atzal, Cave of Eternity
oracle_text: (Transforms from Journey to Eternity.)
{T}: Add one mana of any color.
{3}{B}{G}, {T}: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
flavor_text: . . . but every end is a new beginning.

name: Jungle Creeper
oracle_text: {3}{B}{G}: Return Jungle Creeper from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text:
"You cannot kill it, not for long. It ripens where the ground is soaked with the blood of the slaughtered."
—Atiuru, priest of the Verdant Sun

name: Kumena, Tyrant of Orazca
oracle_text: Tap another untapped Merfolk you control: Kumena, Tyrant of Orazca can't be blocked this turn.
Tap three untapped Merfolk you control: Draw a card.
Tap five untapped Merfolk you control: Put a +1/+1 counter on each Merfolk you control.

name: Legion Lieutenant
oracle_text: Other Vampires you control get +1/+1.
flavor_text: "We long ago abandoned the things that make humans weak: friendship, marriage, family. All that remains is the strength of our devotion."

name: Merfolk Mistbinder
oracle_text: Other Merfolk you control get +1/+1.
flavor_text:
"The mist clothes us when we are bare, hides us when we are alone, and unites us when we are together."
—Nirit of Pashona's band

name: Path of Mettle
oracle_text: When Path of Mettle enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to each creature that doesn't have first strike, double strike, vigilance, or haste.
Whenever you attack with at least two creatures that have first strike, double strike, vigilance, and/or haste, transform Path of Mettle.

name: Metzali, Tower of Triumph
oracle_text: (Transforms from Path of Mettle.)
{T}: Add one mana of any color.
{1}{R}, {T}: Metzali, Tower of Triumph deals 2 damage to each opponent.
{2}{W}, {T}: Choose a creature at random that attacked this turn. Destroy that creature.

name: Profane Procession
oracle_text: {3}{W}{B}: Exile target creature. Then if there are three or more cards exiled with Profane Procession, transform it.
flavor_text: Vona sought a conqueror. Mavren sought a savior. Both found what they sought . . .

name: Tomb of the Dusk Rose
oracle_text: (Transforms from Profane Procession.)
{T}: Add one mana of any color.
{2}{W}{B}, {T}: Put a creature card exiled with this permanent onto the battlefield under your control.
flavor_text: . . . resting in the splendor of the dead.

name: Protean Raider
oracle_text: Raid — If you attacked with a creature this turn, you may have Protean Raider enter the battlefield as a copy of any creature on the battlefield.
flavor_text: Imitation is the sincerest form of piracy.

name: Raging Regisaur
oracle_text: Whenever Raging Regisaur attacks, it deals 1 damage to any target.
flavor_text: Its breath is a gale. Its roar is a volcano. Its anger tears soul from flesh.

name: Relentless Raptor
oracle_text: Vigilance
Relentless Raptor attacks or blocks each combat if able.
flavor_text: As the battle for Orazca unfolded, the contenders discovered that others had already staked a claim.

name: Resplendent Griffin
oracle_text: Flying
Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.)
Whenever Resplendent Griffin attacks, if you have the city's blessing, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

name: Siegehorn Ceratops
oracle_text: Enrage — Whenever Siegehorn Ceratops is dealt damage, put two +1/+1 counters on it. (It must survive the damage to get the counters.)
flavor_text: To a siegehorn, there is no such thing as a dead end.

name: Storm Fleet Sprinter
oracle_text: Haste
Storm Fleet Sprinter can't be blocked.
flavor_text:
"Charge like a red-hot cannonball straight to your target. You slow down, you sink."
—Captain Lannery Storm

name: Storm the Vault
oracle_text: Whenever one or more creatures you control deal combat damage to a player, create a colorless Treasure artifact token with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color."
At the beginning of your end step, if you control five or more artifacts, transform Storm the Vault.

name: Vault of Catlacan
oracle_text: (Transforms from Storm the Vault.)
{T}: Add one mana of any color.
{T}: Add {U} for each artifact you control.
flavor_text: Swimming in coins proved harder than they'd hoped, but dancing was a jingling delight.

name: Zacama, Primal Calamity
oracle_text: Vigilance, reach, trample
When Zacama, Primal Calamity enters the battlefield, if you cast it, untap all lands you control.
{2}{R}: Zacama deals 3 damage to target creature.
{2}{G}: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
{2}{W}: You gain 3 life.

name: Awakened Amalgam
oracle_text: Awakened Amalgam's power and toughness are each equal to the number of differently named lands you control.
flavor_text:
"The fools have done it."
—Tishana

name: Azor's Gateway
oracle_text: {1}, {T}: Draw a card, then exile a card from your hand. If cards with five or more different converted mana costs are exiled with Azor's Gateway, you gain 5 life, untap Azor's Gateway, and transform it.

name: Sanctum of the Sun
oracle_text: (Transforms from Azor's Gateway.)
{T}: Add X mana of any one color, where X is your life total.
flavor_text: As soon as Jace laid eyes on the great sphinx's chamber, the shards of memory began sliding into place.

name: Captain's Hook
oracle_text: Equipped creature gets +2/+0, has menace, and is a Pirate in addition to its other creature types.
Whenever Captain's Hook becomes unattached from a permanent, destroy that permanent.
Equip {1}

name: Gleaming Barrier
oracle_text: Defender
When Gleaming Barrier dies, create a colorless Treasure artifact token with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color."
flavor_text:
"Gold without freedom might as well be lead."
—Angrath

name: Golden Guardian
oracle_text: Defender
{2}: Golden Guardian fights another target creature you control. When Golden Guardian dies this turn, return it to the battlefield transformed under your control.

name: Gold-Forge Garrison
oracle_text: (Transforms from Golden Guardian.)
{T}: Add two mana of any one color.
{4}, {T}: Create a 4/4 colorless Golem artifact creature token.
flavor_text: An army of living gold for the golden city.

name: The Immortal Sun
oracle_text: Players can't activate planeswalkers' loyalty abilities.
At the beginning of your draw step, draw an additional card.
Spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
Creatures you control get +1/+1.

name: Orazca Relic
oracle_text: Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.)
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}, Sacrifice Orazca Relic: You gain 3 life and draw a card. Activate this ability only if you have the city's blessing.

name: Silent Gravestone
oracle_text: Cards in graveyards can't be the targets of spells or abilities.
{4}, {T}: Exile Silent Gravestone and all cards from all graveyards. Draw a card.
flavor_text: Made to ward off the Grim Captain and silence the lure of undeath.

name: Strider Harness
oracle_text: Equipped creature gets +1/+1 and has haste.
Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
flavor_text:
"Because the giant, implacable death lizard wasn't scary enough already."
—Captain Brinely Rage

name: Traveler's Amulet
oracle_text: {1}, Sacrifice Traveler's Amulet: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.
flavor_text:
"The best kind of treasure is the kind that leads to more treasure!"
—Captain Lannery Storm

name: Arch of Orazca
oracle_text: Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.)
{T}: Add {C}.
{5}, {T}: Draw a card. Activate this ability only if you have the city's blessing.

name: Evolving Wilds
oracle_text: {T}, Sacrifice Evolving Wilds: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.
flavor_text: The Sun Empire bends nature—rivers, mountainsides, dinosaurs—to its unyielding will.

name: Forsaken Sanctuary
oracle_text: Forsaken Sanctuary enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {W} or {B}.
flavor_text: In the galleon's grand cathedral, conquistadors swore vows of faith. In its wreckage, they swore vows of revenge.

name: Foul Orchard
oracle_text: Foul Orchard enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {B} or {G}.
flavor_text: The stench of rotting meat lures flies, goblins, and young raptors.

name: Highland Lake
oracle_text: Highland Lake enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {U} or {R}.
flavor_text:
"A place like this makes me wonder if there's more to life than blood and treasure . . . Nah."
—Boyl Bucksalt, Storm Fleet swab

name: Stone Quarry
oracle_text: Stone Quarry enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {R} or {W}.
flavor_text: The Sun Empire's cities are built from the bones of the earth.

name: Woodland Stream
oracle_text: Woodland Stream enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {G} or {U}.
flavor_text: Countless streams flow into the nine rivers, and the nine rivers flow into the Great River. The River Heralds guard them all.

name: Vraska, Scheming Gorgon
oracle_text: +2: Creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.
−3: Destroy target creature.
−10: Until end of turn, creatures you control gain deathtouch and "Whenever this creature deals damage to an opponent, that player loses the game."

name: Vampire Champion
oracle_text: Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
flavor_text: "These pirates must answer for their ancestors, who renounced the Church of Dusk and sailed from Torrezon as heretics."

name: Vraska's Conquistador
oracle_text: Whenever Vraska's Conquistador attacks or blocks, if you control a Vraska planeswalker, target opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
flavor_text: Abandoning both queen and church, he chose to follow power.

name: Vraska's Scorn
oracle_text: Target opponent loses 4 life. You may search your library and/or graveyard for a card named Vraska, Scheming Gorgon, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you search your library this way, shuffle it.

name: Angrath, Minotaur Pirate
oracle_text: +2: Angrath, Minotaur Pirate deals 1 damage to target opponent or planeswalker and each creature that player or that planeswalker's controller controls.
−3: Return target Pirate card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
−11: Destroy all creatures target opponent controls. Angrath, Minotaur Pirate deals damage to that player equal to their total power.

name: Angrath's Ambusher
oracle_text: Angrath's Ambusher gets +2/+0 as long as you control an Angrath planeswalker.
flavor_text: Orcs have been enemies of the Legion of Dusk since it was formed, and the entire race has been declared anathema.

name: Swab Goblin
flavor_text: Though small, goblins can hold their own in a fight. Foolhardy confidence goes a long way.

name: Angrath's Fury
oracle_text: Destroy target creature. Angrath's Fury deals 3 damage to target player or planeswalker. You may search your library and/or graveyard for a card named Angrath, Minotaur Pirate, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you search your library this way, shuffle it.

name: Cinder Barrens
oracle_text: Cinder Barrens enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {B} or {R}.
flavor_text:
"Burn their fleet to the waterline, and sink whatever's left."
—Angrath
